item.title: The next ID@Xbox Showcase is coming on 24th February
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/02/04/the-next-idxbox-showcase-is-coming-on-24th-february/

The next ID@Xbox Showcase is streaming on 24th February at 10am PT / 1pm ET / 6pm GMT as part of IGN Fan Fest.

There’s a big bunch of developers set to take part, but one of the few revealed highlights will be a new collaboration for addictive poker-like roguelite Balatro.

Here’s some of the studios that will be turning up with new trailers and reveals:

  • 11 Bit
  • BigFan
  • Critical Reflex
  • Daedalic
  • Game Source Entertainment
  • No More Robots
  • Panic
  • Playstack
  • Raw Fury
  • Thunder Lotus
  • Cult Games
  • Team17
  • Curve
  • Akapura
  • Don’t Nod

There’s plenty that we might guess could appear through this showcase, with 11 Bit having released Frostpunk 2 on PC last year and might have a console port to announce, or acting as publisher to the upcoming soulslike deck builder Death Howl. Panic, meanwhile, has a bunch of games they’re publishing, including Time Flies, Blippo+ and more. Akapura also has an intriguing title they’re publishing, the 2D role playing game Cabernet, where you play as a 19th century vampire lady. That sounds like it sucks… but in a good way!

So plenty of possibilities, for what is sure to be a busy showcase!
